column2: unique identifier of each tree (indvdID in Idtrees dataset)
column3: path to RGB image tile wrt. root directory
column4: path to hyperspectral image tile wrt. root directory
column5: path to lidar image tile wrt. root directory
column7: minimum distance of bounding box to origin [0,0] (at top-left )along x-axis (height) in pixel
column8: max dist of bbox to origin along y-axis in pixel
column9: max dist of bbox to origin
column10: max dist of bbox to origin
column11: width of image, along y-axis, in pixel
column12: height of image, along x-axis, in pixel
